actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means..

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain losses from shoreline erosion shall be be deductible for purposes of the individual income tax.

summary.text: Allows an income tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for losses exceeding $00 from shoreline erosion.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain losses from shoreline erosion shall be be deductible for purposes of the individual income tax.
